name: chore
description: Changes that don't modify source code or tests

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: p1
description: High-priority issues at the top of the work list

name: p2
description: Important issues not at the top of the work list

name: p3
description: Issues that we currently consider unimportant

name: refactor
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor add a feature

name: revert
description: Changes that reverts a previous commit

name: test
description: Changes that add missing tests or correcting existing tests
